local_intent: Perceive the T-block, move to an overhead pre-push pose at ~2cm above it, then fine-align to stabilize approach.
assumptions: Using the same overhead clearance (offset_z=0.02) and timeouts as in the global plan
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase from the global plan: retry detection of t_block, then MoveAbove with the same clearance and follow with ApproachAndAlign before any push.
